vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in PENNY_BY_PENNY.collect (patch_6.sol#40-47):
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.call.value(_am)() (patch_6.sol#43-46)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- accounts (patch_6.sol#44)
